wrestler:HipThrow_Wrestler.NAME: Hip Throw
wrestler:HipThrow_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy is wrestler:Grappled, deal !D! damage.

wrestler:ElbowCut_Wrestler.NAME: Elbow Cut
wrestler:ElbowCut_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is wrestler:Grappled, draw a card.

wrestler:EldritchLightning_Wrestler.NAME: Eldritch Lightning
wrestler:EldritchLightning_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: wrestler:Devoid. NL Costs 1 less [E] NL for each time a Void card exhausts. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times.

wrestler:HalfNelson_Wrestler.NAME: Half Nelson
wrestler:HalfNelson_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is wrestler:Grappled, deal an additional !M! damage. NL Apply !wrestler:Grapple! wrestler:Grapple.

wrestler:Jab_Wrestler.NAME: Jab
wrestler:Jab_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is wrestler:Grappled, deal !D! damage !M! more times.

wrestler:Melee_Wrestler.NAME: Melee
wrestler:Melee_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Apply !wrestler:Grapple! wrestler:Grapple to ALL enemies.

wrestler:PsychedelicIllusion_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! Dexterity this turn.

wrestler:Roughhouse_Wrestler.NAME: Roughhouse
wrestler:Roughhouse_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to each wrestler:Grappled enemy !M! times.

wrestler:Suplex_Wrestler.NAME: Suplex
wrestler:Suplex_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy is wrestler:Grappled, deal !D! damage. Remove all wrestler:Grapple from that enemy.

wrestler:ArmBar_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy is wrestler:Grappled, gain !B! Block.

wrestler:CharmingWords_Wrestler.NAME: Charming Words
wrestler:CharmingWords_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL If the enemy is grappled, apply !M! weak.

wrestler:FiremanLift_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: Apply !wrestler:Grapple! wrestler:Grapple. NL Each enemy loses HP equal to their wrestler:Grapple.

wrestler:UnearthlySkin_Wrestler.NAME: Unearthly Skin
wrestler:UnearthlySkin_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Strength this turn.

wrestler:BearHug_Wrestler.NAME: Bear Hug

wrestler:Catapult_Wrestler.NAME: Catapult

wrestler:EldritchShock_Wrestler.NAME: Eldritch Shock

wrestler:Go_Wrestler.NAME: Go

wrestler:HammerStrike_Wrestler.NAME: Hammer Strike
wrestler:HammerStrike_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Draw 1 card.

wrestler:Lariat_Wrestler.NAME: Lariat
wrestler:Lariat_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is wrestler:Grappled, NL gain [E] and NL draw 1 card.

wrestler:WeirdConduit_Wrestler.NAME: Weird Conduit

wrestler:BodyShield_Wrestler.NAME: Body Shield

wrestler:ChillTouch_Wrestler.NAME: Chill Touch

wrestler:CloseQuarters_Wrestler.NAME: Close Quarters

wrestler:CraveNothing_Wrestler.NAME: Crave Nothing

wrestler:StickyFingers_Wrestler.NAME: Sticky Fingers

wrestler:AgilityTraining_Wrestler.NAME: Agility Training

wrestler:Chokehold_Wrestler.NAME: Chokehold
